description: Welcome home to Heath West, a modern community of 67 homes proudly developed by BMG Real Estate. This beautiful 3 Bedroom, 2.5 bath home features an open layout, large kitchen w/ Fischer & Paykel SS appliances incl. gas range and double drawer dishwasher.  O/S windows, high efficiency furnace & Heat Pump included for a limited time. Two car parking with oversized double side by side garage! Finishes incl. slim shaker cabinets w/ quartz counters, large deck and fenced yard facing green space, spacious master & spa inspired ensuite plus many more special touches throughout! Heath West is located directly next to Donna Gabriel Robins elementary with a short walk to restaurants, parks and shopping. MOVE IN READY! Sales Centre & Showhomes located at 7918 204B Street, Langley.
